page.title: 12RECREATION IN MORFA BYCHAN
page.content: The Morfa Bychan area has 16 kilometres of public foot paths.one of the longest runs from Garreg Wen to Bron y Foel over the shoulder of Moel y Gest,linking two ancient farm houses. The most popular path is the "Pilot's Path"from Borth y Gest to Morfa Bychan with splendid sea views.A section of this path near an erratic boulder "Garreg Samson"was eroded by the sea and had to be diverted inland. Many paths have been closed and diverted without permission.The paths are poorly sign-posted and badly maintained.This is unfortunate in an area of great natural baeuty which relies heavily on the tourist industry.
